Package org.aion.api.type

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccountDetails
    AccountDetails class containing all relevant information identifying an account
    AccountDetails.AccountDetailsBuilder
    This Builder class is used to build a AccountDetails instance.
    ApiMsg
    The return type of every API call.
    Block
    The Block return data structure, typically used in Block getter API.
    Block.BlockBuilder
    This Builder class is used to build a Block instance.
    BlockDetails
    The BlockDetails return the detailed block information including the transactions and the transaction logs
    BlockDetails.BlockDetailsBuilder  
    CompileResponse
    Contains all relevant information to compile responses, note that some parameters are not yet utilized, but may contain information in future versions.
    CompileResponse.CompileResponseBuilder
    This Builder class is used to build a CompileResponse instance.
    ContractAbiEntry
    Represents an internal representation of a single entry in the JSON ABI Contains all relevant information pertaining to that entry.
    ContractAbiIOParam
    Represents the name and type of the associated I/O parameter within a ABI Entry (function), typically only type is significant.
    ContractDeploy
    The helper class for gather all of the deploy arguments to deploy the contract.
    ContractDeploy.ContractDeployBuilder  
    ContractEvent
    The helper class for gather all of the contract event information.
    ContractEvent.ContractEventBuilder
    This Builder class is used to build a ContractEvent instance.
    ContractEventFilter
    The helper class for gather all of the contract event filter conditions.
    ContractEventFilter.ContractEventFilterBuilder
    This Builder class is used to build a ContractEventFilter instance.
    ContractResponse
    ALl relevant information pertaining to IContract function calls.
    ContractResponse.ContractResponseBuilder
    This Builder class is used to build a ContractResponse instance.
    DeployResponse
    Contains the response information after deployed a contract by contractDeploy The response includes the deployed contract address and the transactionID in this execution.
    Event
    The abstract class for the class ContractEvent defines the event type.
    JsonFmt
    Internal type used in build, not user facing.
    JsonFmt.JsonFmtBuilder
    This Builder class is used to build a JsonFmt instance.
    Key
    The key class wrapped the user account information.
    KeyExport
    The KeyExport class wrapped the keystore information param keyFiles When execute the accountBackup, the keyFiles will be the whole keystore file wrapped as a byte array, otherwise the keyFiles will be the 64-bytes private key.
    MsgRsp
    Represents the transaction status including the execution status and the API session hash.
    Node
    Represents the latest network status and the Aion blockchain status of the node.
    Node.NodeBuilder
    This Builder class is used to build a Node instance.
    Protocol
    Represents the version of each Aion blockchain module.
    Protocol.ProtocolBuilder  
    SyncInfo
    Represents the node syncing status and block info of the connecting node.
    Transaction
    The Transaction return data structure, typically used in Transaction getter API.
    Transaction.TransactionBuilder
    This Builder class is used to build a Transaction instance.
    TxArgs
    The transaction input arguments used in sendTransaction and call.
    TxArgs.TxArgsBuilder
    This Builder class is used to build a TxArgs instance.
    TxDetails
    TxLog class containing all relevant information to transaction log utilized by getTxReceipt.
    TxDetails.TxDetailsBuilder
    This Builder class is used to build a TxDetails instance.
    TxLog
    TxLog class containing all relevant information to transaction log utilized by getTxReceipt.
    TxReceipt
    TxReceipt class containing all relevant information to transaction receipts utilized by getTxReceipt.
    TxReceipt.TxReceiptBuilder
    This Builder class is used to build a TxReceipt instance.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ApiMsg.cast
